title: mStable Decentraland Name Purchase
body:
The mStable core community brought up the opportunity to purchase the official mStable handle on Decentraland, and this proposal seeks to ratify whether or not the mStableDAO should acquire the necessary amount of MANA (9000 MANA at the time of writing this proposal) in order to purchase this identifier for use in the wider mStable ecosystem.

Claiming the mStable handle on Decentraland would have the following key benefits:

- Impersonating mStable in Decentraland will be impossible
- mStable can be officially represented via Avatar in Decentraland accordingly
- It opens up opportunities for official giveaways, cosmetics, airdrops, virtual meetups, and other related activities in Decentraland

If this vote is successful, the mStableDAO will acquire the necessary amount of MANA in exchange for mUSD, and then purchase the name on the open Decentraland marketplace.

**Should the mStableDAO acquire the necessary amount of MANA in order to purchase the mStable name on the open Decentraland Marketplace?**
author: 0x908DB31Ce01DC42c8B712f9156E969bc65023119
